column4: how do you access another computer remotely and control it in ubuntu - i have two computers both are 1004 and i want to be able to connect to my desktop from a remote location and control it
I'm on ssh to my Ubuntu machine as it is, no idea what packages you have installed.
so, you want to view the desktop?
first, install vinaigre using the software manager.
then, look for a remote desktop client. I'll go look up what mine's called.
those two lines were for you, by the way
brb. it's in the menus, or perhaps hanging off as an application onthe panel if you add it.
sounds good, and sounds like you at least know what you're doing.
yeah, and if you click "Connect", what does that bring up?
cool, but it doesn't open, you say?
okay. On the "server" machine, log out, log back in.
check out what MaRk-I posted a little while back.
